author: Abby Connolly
title: While Always Treating Yourself Is Great For Improving Your Quality of Life, It Can Drain Your Bank Account Faster Than You Realize
description: Who doesn’t love treating themselves?  Over the last few years, everyone’s been talking about the beauty of the “little treat.” The $6 coffee you get from Starbucks after you’ve completed a difficult task? That’s a little treat. The new candle or skincare product you bought from Target on your way home from work the other […]

author: Conor Murray, Forbes Staff
title: Costa Coffee Latest Victim Of Anti-‘Woke’ Anger Over Design Featuring Trans Person
description: The British coffee chain included an illustration of a trans person who has top surgery scars on a company van.

author: Wiktoria Wrzyszcz
title: Couple running much loved Chesterfield coffee van reassure customers they will be back - following road accident
description: A much loved Chesterfield coffee van was involved in traffic accident last week – but owners are reassuring customers they will be back as soon as possible.

author: Melanie Macleod
title: I'm a nutritionist and this is how I make my daily coffee habit healthier
description: HELLO! spoke to nutritionist and holistic health coach Joan Abebe about her love of coffee – and how she makes it a healthier choice

author: Gil Tucker
title: Calgary coffee roaster’s conservation efforts sparked by experience fighting wildfires
description: The founders of Calgary Heritage Roasting Company met while fighting wildfires. Now, they make sure to give back to communities impacted by the wild flames.

author: Hyunsoo Rim, Contributor
title: Starbucks Posts Record $9.2 Billion In Sales—But Still Falls Short Of Expectations—Amid Price Increases And China Recovery
description: Coffee giant Starbucks on Tuesday announced record quarterly sales fueled by a strong recovery in China, but still missed analyst estimates as demand fell short in the U.S.

title: Exciting new Australasian coffee and cocktail bar MANUKA to open in Liverpool city centre

title: The 17 best mini fridges for dorms, basements and more in 2023
description: From storing dining hall leftovers to bottled iced coffees, mini-fridges are a must.

author: Shannon Thaler
title: UK coffee chain Costa slammed over trans ad showing surfer with mastectomy scars
description: Coffeehouse chain Costa is facing fierce backlash on social media over a cartoon advert that features a transgender man with scars reminiscent of ones after receiving double mastectomy.

title: Costa Coffee defends mural of post-op trans man after boycott threat
description: Costa Coffee included a transgender person with mastectomy scars in a cartoon advert

title: Stunning Sussex garden to host summer charity event on Wednesday 16 August 2023
description: Bates Green Garden is opening its doors and inviting people of all ages to enjoy coffee and cake, and an afternoon tea, in support of an Eastbourne-based educational charity.The stunning Sussex garden will host this relaxed, family-friendly event on Wednesday 16 August 2023 between 10am and 4pm.

author: Elizabeth McSheffrey
title: Downtown Vancouver coffee shop closing, ‘fed up’ with rising crime
description: John Neate, CEO of JJ Bean Coffee Roasters, said he's "fed up with the neighbourhood" and has reached a deal with his landlord to end the location's lease early, at a price.

author: Caiti McGowan
title: She Screamed At Her Dad For Trying To Make Her Not Eat Certain Things Her Pregnant Stepmom Can’t Enjoy
description: This 15-year-old girl lives with her father and her stepmother, Anna, who is currently five months pregnant. Right now, a lot of foods are making Anna feel nauseous, especially coffee, anything sugary, Mexican food, and Thai food. The only meat that Anna can eat at the moment is chicken because the smell of any other […]
